title: Mini-Ep 87: Snail Mail and Family Matters
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 87: Snail Mail and Family Matters
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate and Doree offer advice to someone striving to set boundaries with a relative while also supporting them, share a caller's lip care tip, and hear from people with advice for a young listener who's struggling to keep in touch wit...
description:
This week Kate and Doree offer advice to someone striving to set boundaries with a relative while also supporting them, share a caller's lip care tip, and hear from people with advice for a young listener who's struggling to keep in touch with long distance friends after a big move.


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Conair - To buy the InfinitiPRO by Conair Texture Styling Hair Dryer, go to Conair.com and search for Textured Hair.
  • Essie - To learn more about Essie Expressie check out essie.com.
  • StitchFix - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box. 
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • StoryWorth - For $20 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.
  • Native - For 20% off your first purchase just visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.



Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
